Weather_Para_1: Stay ahead of the seasons with real-time weather updates tailored for farmers. Our weather section provides accurate forecasts, temperature trends, rainfall predictions, and more, helping you make informed decisions for planting, irrigation, and harvest.
Weather_Para_2: With reliable data, you can optimize your farming practices and protect your crops, no matter the weather.
Weather_Para_3: Accurate weather information is crucial for successful farming. Understanding weather patterns helps you make informed decisions about planting, irrigation, and crop protection.
Weather_Para_4: Our weather section provides real-time updates, forecasts, and alerts tailored to your region, helping you stay ahead of changing conditions.
Weather_Para_5: With this valuable data, you can optimize crop care, improve yields, and reduce risks from extreme weather events. Stay informed and plan smarter with our reliable weather insights.
Weather_Para_6: Weather plays a vital role in the success of any farming operation. From planting to harvesting, understanding local weather conditions can help you make informed decisions about your crops.

description1: Krushiratn App is a fast and reliable digital platform where farmers can buy and sell agricultural tools, animals, land, seeds, fertilizers, and more directly with other farmers in their area.
description2: This helps in quick selling, as nearby buyers can easily find the required products and contact the seller directly. Farmers get the best price without intermediaries.
buyersNearby: Buyers in your area can easily find and purchase what they need.
sellAtBestPrice: Sell at the best price that suits you.
uploadDetails: Upload details and photos of your product in minutes.
localBuyers: Get buyers from your area, ensuring a smooth transaction.

buysell.title: Krushiratn App ‚Äì A Digital Marketplace for Farmers
buysell.subTitle: Buy & Sell Farming Goods Quickly & Easily
buysell.description1: Krushiratn App is a fast and reliable digital platform where farmers can buy and sell agricultural tools, animals, land, seeds, fertilizers, and more directly with other farmers in their area.
buysell.description2: This helps in quick selling, as nearby buyers can easily find the required products and contact the seller directly. Farmers can get the best price for their products without intermediaries.
buysell.feature2Desc: Buyers in your area can easily find and purchase what they need.
buysell.feature3Desc: Sell at the best price that suits you.
buysell.feature4Desc: Upload details and photos of your product in minutes.
buysell.feature5Desc: Get buyers from your area, ensuring a smooth transaction.
buysell.howToHeading: How to Buy & Sell on Krushiratn App?
buysell.step1: Step 1: Download the app and create your account.
buysell.step2: Step 2: Upload product details and images for selling.
buysell.step3: Step 3: Nearby farmers can see your listing and contact you.
buysell.step4: Step 4: Finalize the deal and complete the transaction.
